experience_details.description: Operate varies machines, complete work orders in a timely accurate fashion, inspect parts & keep work area clean
Ability and willingness to work rotating shifts, including weekends and holidays
Conducting regular inspections of machinery and fixing issues in a timely manner to ensure that they run smoothly, avoiding unnecessary delays
Writing skills to communicate information to others and to input operations data into the computer
Operate production equipment in a safe and effective manner while utilizing Standard Operating Procedures
Operate a crane to assist the production process
Conducting regular inspections of machinery and fixing issues in a timely manner to ensure that they run smoothly, avoiding unnecessary delays
Ability and willingness to work rotating shifts, including weekends and holidays. Works with a sense of urgency while maintaining quality and company safety standards
